page.title: 11MUSIC IN CARDINGTON,SHROPS.
page.content: The music of a small village like Cardington is necessarily a microcosm of that of society as a whole,although we are perhaps blessed with an above- average sprinkling of musicians. There is the sacred music of the church choir,the duo that play for pints in the Royal Oak,the duo that play for the local gigs and the pianist who teaches music at home and neighbouring school. The children too play a variety of instruments with strains of piano, violin,clarinet,bassoon,recorder,flute and latterly a selection of brass band instruments supplementing the background of constant murmurings in this quiet community.
